basics.name: Jorrit
basics.label: Full Stack Developer
basics.summary: I'm a full stack developer who can build apps from the ground up. I enjoy working in an dynamic and agile environments on products that add value to business and society. My background in business administration helps me to better understand the business question. I'm generally a flexible and responsible person that likes to learn new things.

work.name: Sungevity
work.description: Solar energy equipment supplier in Amsterdam
work.summary: My first job as a programmer. I worked here in a team with developers (7 at is peak), analists, product/process owners in an agile way using Kanban/Scrum. As a team we are, among others, responsible for customer facing websites and portals, sales and installation process support systems (planning, invoicing, etc.), solar system monitoring, maintaining our CRM (SugarCRM), reporting and alerting on our customer's solar system performance. Our systems are setup with a microservices backend running on AWS lambda's (serverless) combined with Appsync for GraphQL endpoints. In the frontend we mainly use VueJS V2 and V3. Unfortunately a large part of the team left the company leaving me as the sole responsible to maintain our systems
highlights: Took part in building and maintaining a solar production monitoring platform for B2C and B2B customers including multiple integrations with external solar hardware suppliers
Wrote logic (mainly in PostgreSQL) that enables reporting and alerting on customers solar panel performance
Took the sole responsibility for all our systems and act as point of contact for all tech/dev related questions within the business for a period of over six months

work.name: ClickValue
work.description: Marketing agency in Amsterdam now part of LevelUpGroup
work.summary: Affiliate, Web Analytics, SEA (Google and Bing), comparison sites, automated and feed-driven marketing. ClickValue works for international clients as Heineken, Adidas and Harman. Reason for leaving: Work/travel abroad for 8 months.
highlights: Automated product offer and pricing in Google Shopping and Marketplaces based on product performance
Responsible for search engine advertisement perfomance of thirtheen clients

work.name: Custom Links
work.summary: International link management platform for creating and managing branded short links. Responsibly for idea development, design, project management, finance,content creation, marketing, PR, customer contact and more.

work.name: Miscellaneous
work.summary: Online marketing consultant DLVR (now https://greymen.co/), Webcare agent KPN (Telfort), Co-Founder Browse
